text: A Span of Earth () is a 1964 Soviet drama movie directed by Andrey Smirnov and Boris Yashin.«Долги наши», «Мещерские», «Ливень». Фильмы, по которым мы запомним Бориса ЯшинаПЯДЬ ЗЕМЛИ It stars Aleksandr Zbruyev, Elliya Sukhanova, and Yevgeni Urbansky. == Actors == * Aleksandr Zbruyev as Aleksandr Motovilov * Elliya Sukhanova as Rita Tamashova * Yevgeni Urbansky as Aleksey Babin * Sergei Kurilov as Bryl * Mikhail Vorontsov as Afanasiy Makletsov * Aleksandr Titov as Shumilin == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1964 drama movies Category:Soviet drama movies Category:Movies directed by Boris Yashin
title: A Span of Earth
